channel.title: Make it so u dont lose your stuff in castle wars
channel.description: Ok im using d d s p 3 c v3 and as u no it has castle wars, but in castle wars u lose items, i was wondernig if there was any way to make it so u dont lsoe ur items. Thanks

item.title: Make it so u dont lose your stuff in castle wars
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Or just declare the coordinates for the Castle Wars area and in your applyDead method work with that.

Also, teleNubby had a tutorial on this…

No idea where it is though.

Read full topic

item.title: Make it so u dont lose your stuff in castle wars
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

public boolean castle(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((coordY >= ####) && (coordY <= ####) && (coordX <= ####) fighting = false; hits = 0; sendMessage("Oh dear you have died! But you keep your items as your in castle wars"); pEmote = 2820; }

then in your castle wars code or w.e… put this

castle = true;

Was that so hard?

Read full topic

viva la vida[/quote]
